data.prayer: Lord, make the 808,995 believers in Bungoma to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 821,905 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bungoma, Kenya
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 808,995 believers in Bungoma, Kenya how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 808,995 believers in Bungoma, Kenya to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Bungoma, Kenya that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Ilchamus people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please raise up prophets in Bungoma who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who are far from you in Bungoma. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Bungoma, Kenya, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

location.name: Bungoma
location.people_groups_list: Munyoyaya, Sindhi, Punjabi, Oromo, Sakuye, Midgan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Munyoyaya (2,100), Sindhi (3,300), Punjabi (67,000), Oromo, Sakuye (35,000), Midgan (2,600)
